summary: This is a brief email exchange on August 10, 2019, between U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman and an OIG official, confirming Berman's availability for a call regarding the Epstein matter. It indicates coordination between the U.S. Attorney's Office and the Office of the Inspector General shortly after Epstein's arrest.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.role: U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the email, confirming his availability for a call regarding the Epstein matter.

events.title: Coordination Call on Epstein Matter
events.description: U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman confirms his availability for a call with an OIG official to discuss the Epstein case.

keyFacts: On August 10, 2019, U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman was coordinating with the Office of the Inspector General (OIG) regarding the Epstein investigation.
The email exchange shows direct communication between the U.S. Attorney's Office and the OIG about the Epstein matter.
The timing of the correspondence (August 10, 2019) is shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest on July 6, 2019, indicating ongoing investigative activity.
